item.title: Reply from McDonald’s Global Compliance Office
item.description: From: Global Compliance Office of McDonald’s Corporation <business.integrity@us.mcd.com> Subject: Re: Have you received my communications? Please acknowledge receipt. Date received: November 19, 2019 at 01:19 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre Vincent - Our apologies for not responding, however, it appears that we did not receive your communications. Could you provide us with the information that you previously provided? Thanks. Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2019-11-19-reply-from-mcdonalds-global-compliance-office_Redacted.pdf To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
